processingCommand.script:
:SET &DBLOAD_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DBLOAD_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &RESTORE_INTEGRATOR# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,RESTORE_INTEGRATOR,1)
:SET &MOCAREG_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,MOCAREG_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CREATESFTP_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CREATESFTP_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &LOGBACKUP_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,LOGBACKUP_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DBALL_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DBALL_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CUSTOMIZATION_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CUSTOMIZATION_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &POSTDBLOAD_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTDBLOAD_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DBDEPLOY_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DBDEPLOY_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &INSTALLUAM_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,INSTALLUAM_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &COPY_INTEGRATOR# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,COPY_INTEGRATOR,1)
:SET &CODE_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CODE_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DBVERSION_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DBVERSION_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DBCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DBCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &TARGET_DISABLE_JOBS# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TARGET_DISABLE_JOBS,1)
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)
:SET &USERINSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,USERINSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DATA_COPY_DAYS# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DATA_COPY_DAYS,1)
:SET &DBCOPY_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DBCOPY_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CREATEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CREATEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &RPTABUPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,RPTABUPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DBCREATE_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DBCREATE_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &PORTALSERVER_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PORTALSERVER_SCRIPT_NAME,1)

:PUB &DBLOAD_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &RESTORE_INTEGRATOR# 
:PUB &MOCAREG_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &CREATESFTP_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &LOGBACKUP_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DBALL_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &CUSTOMIZATION_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &POSTDBLOAD_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DBDEPLOY_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &INSTALLUAM_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &COPY_INTEGRATOR# 
:PUB &CODE_COPY_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DBVERSION_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DBCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &TARGET_DISABLE_JOBS# 
:PUB &TZ# 
:PUB &USERINSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DATA_COPY_DAYS# 
:PUB &DBCOPY_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &CREATEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &RPTABUPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DBCREATE_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &PORTALSERVER_SCRIPT_NAME# 

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

! Get Major Version
:DEFINE &AVER#, string, 5
:FILL &AVER#[] = STR_SPLIT("&APPLICATION_VERSION#", ".")
:SET &APPLICATION_MAJOR_VERSION# = &AVER#[1]
:PUBLISH &APPLICATION_MAJOR_VERSION#

:SET &REST_MODULES# = "WMS,REFS,RW,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = "WMS,REFS,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES_DB#,,WORKFLOW

! Instance name uppercase
:SET &INSTANCE_NAME_UC# = STR_UC(&INSTANCE_NAME#)
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_NAME_UC#,,WORKFLOW

! Restart type
:SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER", 1)
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID# = ""
:PUBLISH &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "True"

! STRY0029851 - eventual E4 event always assign to LATAM L2
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "False"

:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV#,,WORKFLOW

! Vanilla
:IF &VANILLA_INSTANCE_NAME# = "null"
:  SET &VANILLA_INSTANCE_NAME# = ""
:  PUBLISH &VANILLA_INSTANCE_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
